description:
In this video, Thorsten Schaeff (https://twitter.com/thorwebdev) teaches Jason how to build an e-commerce store using the new Stripe Checkout.

See the source at https://github.com/jlengstorf/stripe-ecomm (demo: https://gatsby-stripe-ecomm.netlify.com/)

https://stripe.com/docs/payments/checkout
https://github.com/njosefbeck/gatsby-plugin-stripe
https://github.com/njosefbeck/gatsby-source-stripe

Watch future livestreams at https://www.twitch.tv/jlengstorf
title: Build an Ecommerce Site Using Stripe and Gatsby â€” Learn With Jason
